rdlst.sndbt: Great system, love it, color varies...
rdlst.cntnt: We really like the Evenflo Aura travel system.  It works great, cleans up good, and is easy to use.  When we got the system, we did notice some little color spots on the car seat base that looked like stressed plastic.  We talk to evenflo and sent them pictures and all and they assured us that it was a glitch in their dye, it happens...

rdlst.sndbt: Great value, great system
rdlst.cntnt: We bought this for our second child. We picked this out because it was less expensive than most other travel system stoller/carseat combos. We also picked it because it was gender neutral and new that we would be having at least one more baby and would like to reuse it. This system is all great quality. Additional carseat bases were available for p...

rdlst.sndbt: You might want to take a pass on this one.
rdlst.cntnt: This is the first travel system that I ever bought and would not buy it again. Besides being very bulky as a travel system it does not fit well in compact cars.  I have a toyota corolla and the front seats had to be pushed up so far that it was impossible for anyone to sit in the passenger seat.  Also a small detail but the visor that goe...

rdlst.sndbt: love the Z handle
rdlst.cntnt: Overall I am happy with this travel set.  The Evenflo Aura Elite Travel System is easy to use and handles city terrain very well.  I find the wipes dispenser to be useless but the cup holders and small zipper compartment are very handy for a water/baby bottle, a cell phone, keys, and a wallet.  The infant seat is a little large, it f...

rdlst.sndbt: I wish I would have spent the money on a different stroller
rdlst.cntnt: I liked the car seat but I had all kinds of problems with the stroller.  The wheels were not sturdy at all and I stopped using the stroller because my husband had to keep fixing them.  It was hard to fold up and at times I got embaressed when it took me a minute to get it to fold up.  It is also extrememly large compared to other str...

rdlst.sndbt: A good package of Car Seat & Stroller
rdlst.cntnt: I bought the Evenflo Aura Elite Travel System which is a package of car seat and stroller since it includes both car seat and stroller. I bought it when I had my baby and have been using it for the past one and a half year. This car seat can be adjusted as your baby grows. That's a cool feature of this car seat. One of the main cons of this particu...

rdlst.sndbt: LOVE this product.
rdlst.cntnt: i own this system and boy it is great. I walk a lot with my baby so it really comes in handy. a little difficult to pu together but i managed by  myself. easy to hook car seat on or off. when carseat it off you cant put in different positions as well.

rdlst.sndbt: Doesn't get any better!!!!
rdlst.cntnt: First, I want to say that to those of you having issues with the seat being to upright, read your carseat manual front to back and you will not have this issue. That being said, I wish I would have gone with this system in the very beginning. I have had a Graco, and an Eddie Bauer and I hated them both with a passion! The strollers were ok I guess...

rdlst.sndbt: Doesn't fit in my car!!
rdlst.cntnt: I bought the Evenflo aura travel system because I found a really good deal on it. We bought the travel system with two bases for the car seats. The pattern on it was really cute, and I initially liked the "z" handle on the car seat because I thought it would be easier to carry. After having the system for a while, I've found I really dislike the ca...

rdlst.sndbt: Evenfol Aura Elite Travel System has not let me down
rdlst.cntnt: This is a perfect newborn system.  You can easily attach the carseat to the stroller or put child directly in stroller.  I like the design of the handle which makes it easy to carry the carseat.  The canopy cover on the carsaet moves from front to back giving cover where you need it on baby.  It is a good size canopy as wel...

rdlst.sndbt: Excellent System - New for 2008
rdlst.cntnt: This travel system is new. I got the Oh So Big model and it is adorable. The fabric is perfect for a boy or a girl. The car seat base fits very snugly in rear center of our Camry. The seat is easy to get in and out of the base. The base has an adjustable tilt setting in case you have seats that have a dip in it. It has 3 stages of ...

rdlst.sndbt: Evenflos Aura Elite Travel System is FANTASTIC!
rdlst.cntnt: This travel system is amazing! My baby is 15 weeks old and is my first. When my husband and I were trying to decide which travel system to buy, we spent hours reading reviews and testing products at Babies R Us. We LOVE that this travel system has a "z" handle...it makes it much easier to bear the weight when carrying it. We also love how easy it i...

rdlst.sndbt: Worth every penny!!!
rdlst.cntnt: This travel system has been an excellent choice for us. The car seat is light and snaps easily into the base and also the stroller. The covers on both the car seat and the stroller can be removed and thrown into the washing machine (we have done so many times!!). The car seat also has a handle which makes it easy to carry.  The stroller has a...

rdlst.sndbt: Poor customer service for an expensive product
rdlst.cntnt: My grandson's Aura stroller quickly had problems.  First was the backrest broke and second- one of the rear tires broke off.  Evenflo customer service response by phone was "don't use the stroller any more".  Therefore it is not repairable...

rdlst.sndbt: Evenflo Aura Elite Travel System stroller is a great stroller!!
rdlst.cntnt: I have a 5 month old baby. We bought Evenflo Aura Elite Travel System Stroller in April, 2010. I am very satisfied. Its very comfortable for the baby. I also like that its covered everywhere, so no wind blows on my baby. Its a little bit heavy, but not to heavy... My friend had it for her baby and she recommended it to me. And n...

rdlst.sndbt: Not a fan
rdlst.cntnt: I received this as a gift for my baby shower, and I was very happy with the system when I got it. Overall it is a decent stroller for the price, but I would pick something different for my next baby.  The stroller is very large and bulky, it is easy to open and close which is a plus. I don't like that the shade does not extend very far. It do...

rdlst.sndbt: Great set!
rdlst.cntnt: I love this set! We did not find out the gender of our baby until he was born, so we wanted a travel system that would work for a boy or a girl. This was perfect! I love the handle on the car seat. It made for carrying my kiddo much easier, especially as he got bigger. I love the big storage basket on the bottom. It easily held a diaper bag, a...

rdlst.sndbt: Pretty good, but didn't stand up to the test of time
rdlst.cntnt: I bought this travel system before my first child was born, thinking it would be great.  And at first, it was.  I loved being able to put the carrier straight onto the stroller.  The carrier's handle made it much easier to carry than other styles.  The stroller has great control, even one-handed.  When my son outgrew the ca...

rdlst.sndbt: Really nice, but not for jogging.
rdlst.cntnt: When I was first looking for strollers I had my eye on a specific jogging stroller travel system, but it was continually out of stock and I was getting closer and closer to my due date with no car seat or stroller!  So, I decided to get the Evenflo Auraâ„¢ Elite - Greenville Travel System Stroller and get a jogging stroller later down...

rdlst.sndbt: Evenflo Travel System was well worth the money.
rdlst.cntnt: I recieved this Travel System for a baby shower gift. The print on this is great for boy or girl. It was easy for me to figure out how to use and install into my vehicle. The only issue was trying to put the infant carrier into the stroller and secure it. My child did outgrow the infant carrier rather fast but the handle was easy to carry the seat....
